example.eg: The supreme leader surveyed his subjects who were prone before him.
example.egtrans: 臣民们俯身在地，接受至高领袖的审视。

example.eg: I am prone to migraine headaches; I get one at least once a month.
example.egtrans: 我容易患偏头痛，每个月至少会复发一次。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 可能…的, 倾向于…的, 容易

example.eg: Alan is prone to taking days off without bothering to give an explanation.
example.egtrans: 艾伦总是喜欢请假，甚至连借口都懒得找。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 倾向做某事的, 有意于做某事的, 喜欢做某事的

example.eg: We decided my brother was accident-prone when he had two broken arms, a cracked skull, and a torn ligament all in one year.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 爱出事故的, 笨手笨脚老出错的
